codes.code: argmax 'You will be presented with a series of questions in Latin about geographical locations and basic Latin concepts. Understand the context of the question and respond accurately in Latin. Ensure your answers are grammatically correct. Provide the answer only. 1. \'Lauda|nd|us -a -um\' est ~, quod est adiectīvum prīmae et secundae dēclīnātiōnis. Choose from this set of possible answers [ gerundīvum, ndus ndus endus endus, enda est] [ANSWER]' from 'openai/text-davinci-001' where ANSWER in [ 'gerundīvum', 'ndus ndus endus endus', 'enda est']

argmax 'You will be presented with a series of questions in Latin about geographical locations and basic Latin concepts. Understand the context of the question and respond accurately in Latin. Ensure your answers are grammatically correct. Provide the answer only. 2. Gerundīvum (nōm. sing. masc.) dēsinit in -nd|us [1, 2] aut -end|us [3, 4], quod ad thema praesentis adicitur: lauda|~, mone|~, leg|~, audi|~. Choose from this set of possible answers [ gerundīvum, ndus ndus endus endus, enda est] [ANSWER]' from 'openai/text-davinci-001' where ANSWER in [ 'gerundīvum', 'ndus ndus endus endus', 'enda est']

argmax 'You will be presented with a series of questions in Latin about geographical locations and basic Latin concepts. Understand the context of the question and respond accurately in Latin. Ensure your answers are grammatically correct. Provide the answer only. 3. Gerundīvum cum verbō \'esse\' coniūnctum significat id quod fierī oportet: epistula scrīb~ ~ = epistulam scrībī oportet. Choose from this set of possible answers [ gerundīvum, ndus ndus endus endus, enda est] [ANSWER]' from 'openai/text-davinci-001' where ANSWER in [ 'gerundīvum', 'ndus ndus endus endus', 'enda est']
